## spark_graphframe

## Description
Retrieve a GraphFrame


## Usage
```r
spark_graphframe(x, ...)

spark_graphframe(x, ...)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An object coercable to a GraphFrame (typically, a `gf_graphframe`). |
| ... | additional arguments, not used |
